docs.lead_paragraph: Five years after a computer won “Jeopardy,” excitement over A.I. is at a peak, but the commercial potential of the achievement will take some years to be realized.

headline.main: The Promise of Artificial Intelligence Unfolds in Small Steps

docs.abstract: Early roadblocks with IBM's Watson computer, despite its 2011 victory over human contestants in quiz show Jeopardy, demonstrates that commercializing technology comes slowly; public and rest of tech industry remains excited by artificial intelligence, with venture capitalists investing $8.5 billion in 2015, over triple 2010 amount.
docs.snippet: Five years after a computer won “Jeopardy,” excitement over A.I. is at a peak, but the commercial potential of the achievement will take some years to be realized.
